title: Terminator 2 3D: Battle Across Time T-HOPE Ultimate Edition
description:
Terminator 2 3D: Battle Across Time is an atraction in the Universal Studios themeparks in Orlando (Florida), Los Angeles (California) and Osaka (Japan). It features the cast members from the movie blockbuster Terminator 2; Arnold Schwarzenegger, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick and Linda Hamilton. But that&#039;s not all. It&#039;s a 3D show with live actors and some environmental special effects. Too bad these two things couldn&#039;t be included on the DVD ;-)

The show has never been released on DVD. Logical ofcourse, but people who do not have the possibility to go to one of these themeparks, are missing this little adventure. Now, they at least get a good glimpse at it. Plus more!!!


The content:

DISC I - Main Feature
LIVE SHOW - The complete live experience (interactive).
WORKPRINTS - Test versions of the show.
QUEUE AREA - The promotional Cyberdyne video by themepark.
3D VILLAIN - Meet Terminator 2 3D&#039;s villain in the third dimension.
INFO / FACTS - Everything you thought you&#039;d know... and much more!

DISC II - Bonus Features
BACKSTAGE - Go behind-the-scenes of Terminator 2 3D.
ELECTRONIC PRESS KIT - Exclusive promotional footage.
PROMOTIONAL SPOTS - Trailers, commercials, and more.
CYBERDYNE SHOWCASE - The future of technology... Today!
IMAGES - Conceptual artwork, posters, and more.

Just compare it to the official Terminator 2 Ultimate Edition. Only this set is fanmade and focussed on Terminator 2 3D.


Technical info:
2 DVD set (disc 1: 3,93 gb, disc 2: 3,30 gb).
NTSC 720 x 480 video, Dobly Digital (AC3) audio. Region free.
Cover artwork is included in the DVD_ROM folder on both the discs.


Keywords:
- Terminator
- 3D
- Universal Studios
- Fanedit
- Preservation
- Special Edition
- Workprint
- Live

Important note:
In the beginning, seeding will be done by me alone. So it can go slowly in the beginning. Please have some understanding for this and don&#039;t go complaining about it. Hopefully in the future, more people will seed this. Also, be fair and at least seed this to a 1:1 ratio, so other people get the chance to see it.
